DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD IN BRIEF ; INDIA ; PAKISTAN IMPLICATED IN DEADLY BOMBINGS
DOC.TEXT: Documents carried by a suspect in a wave of bombings that killed more_than 300 in Bombay last year show that Pakistan was involved , India ' s home affairs minister said.Top suspect Yakub Abdul Razak Memon was arrested in New Delhi . Indian Home Affairs Minister S.B. Chavan said documents recovered from Memon " confirm the complicity of Pakistan in these blasts. " Pakistan has denied involvement in the 13 terrorist bombings in March , 1993 , that occurred after Hindu-Muslim riots swept India .
